report.title: EBMS Sample Download Report
report.description: Lists saved samples. Normally invoked from download bar on annual summary page.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN surveys su ON parent.survey_id = su.id #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND parent.deleted = false AND parent.parent_id is null AND su.website_id in (#website_ids#) #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: parent.id as sample_id, ctt.term as site_type, l.code as site_code, l.name as site_name, l.centroid_sref as centroid_sref, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, parent.comment, parent.entered_sref, (SELECT AVG(savs.int_value) FROM samples ss JOIN sample_attribute_values savs ON savs.sample_id = ss.id AND savs.deleted = FALSE JOIN sample_attributes sas ON savs.sample_attribute_id = sas.id AND sas.deleted = FALSE AND sas.caption = '% Sun' WHERE parent.id = ss.parent_id AND ss.deleted = FALSE) as mean_sun
